content.text:
# List of World War II aces from Germany: Q–S

This is a list of fighter aces in World War II from Germany with their surname starting from Q to S. A flying ace or fighter ace is a military aviator credited with shooting down five or more enemy aircraft during aerial combat. Aces are listed alphabetically by last name.
Aces
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 183-J0526-0037-001, Günther Rall.jpg|Günther Rall, third most successful fighter pilot in aviation history.
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 183-2007-1218-501, Erich Rudorffer.jpg|Erich Rudorffer, claimed thirteen aerial victories on a single mission
File:Heinz-Wolfgang Schnaufer.jpg|Heinz-Wolfgang Schnaufer, most successful night fighter pilot in aviation history
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 146-2008-0024, Paul Semrau.jpg|Paul Semrau, night fighter pilot
By surname:
A–F  G–L  M–P  T–Z
Q
